tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE swimming_pool_inventory (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  last_checked DATE
)

CREATE TABLE swimming_pools (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  pool_name TEXT,
  city TEXT,
  capacity INTEGER,
  status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE pool_facilities (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  opening_hours TEXT,
  pool_id INTEGER REFERENCES swimming_pools(id)
)

CREATE TABLE pool_equipment (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name TEXT,
  equipment_type TEXT,
  quantity INTEGER,
  pool_id INTEGER REFERENCES swimming_pools(id)
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  pool_id INTEGER REFERENCES swimming_pools(id),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE lifeguards (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  certification_level TEXT,
  pool_id INTEGER REFERENCES swimming_pools(id),
  status TEXT
)
